thread.title: CONtv LIVE Brings New York Comic Con 2015 to Fans Everywhere on 10/10/15!
thread.title_full: CONtv LIVE Brings New York Comic Con 2015 to Fans Everywhere on 10/10/15!

author: admin
title: CONtv LIVE Brings New York Comic Con 2015 to Fans Everywhere on 10/10/15!
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/9/2015 @ 2:36 PM   CONtv 
LOS ANGELES & NEW YORK -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- New York Comic Con 2015 has arrived! If you couldn’t get a badge to this year's show have no fear, CONtv has got you covered! This Saturday, October 10 th from 2-5p.m. ET/11 a.m.-2 p.m. PT, CONtv LIVE will bring fans of all things pop culture comprehensive coverage of this year’s New York Comic Con. Hosted by Erin Darling, Tony Kim and Andre Meadows, CONtv LIVE will bring fans an up-close look at the biggest panels, interviews, cosplayers, collectibles, and all the best the show floor has to offer. 
Viewers will gain access to exclusive interviews with some of the biggest names in the industry. Tune in to see the CONtv team chatting with Sean Bean ( Legends ), Finn Jones ( Game of Thrones), Rebecca Romijn ( The Librarians ), Josh Holloway ( Colony ) and more! CONtv will also be covering news from some of the hottest properties including Robot Chicken , Attack of Titan . Part of the excitement of a live viewing experience is you never know what will happen, so tune in to catch all the action. 
CONtv is available on connected devices including Roku® Players and Roku TV™ models, Android and Mac iOS, Samsung Smart TV, the web, and mobile and tablet devices. 
To watch the CONtv NYCC 2015 trailer, click here . 
About CONtv 
CONtv is a new digital entertainment network devoted exclusively to the fanspace that provides audiences access to thousands of hours of content showcasing an original slate of programming, as well as an eclectic catalog of over 1,200 must-watch titles. Everything from quirky original series, elusive cult films & television shows, celebrated genre movies encompassing sci-fi, horror, fantasy, anime, grindhouse, martial arts action, to exclusive live coverage of Comic Con events nationwide, all available on-demand either in a free, ad-supported format or a subscription-based model for premium content. Together, they provide an unrivalled hub of content, community and conventions across the broad spectrum of devices including Android and Mac iOS, Samsung Smart TV, the web, and mobile and tablet devices. For more information, visit CONtv.com. 
About Cinedigm 
Cinedigm is a leading independent content distributor in the United States, with direct relationships with thousands of physical retail storefronts and digital platforms, including Wal-Mart, Target, iTunes, Netflix, and Amazon, as well as the national Video on Demand platform on cable television. The company’s library of films and TV episodes encompasses award-winning documentaries from Docurama Films®, next-gen Indies from Flatiron Film Company®, acclaimed independent films and festival picks through partnerships with the Sundance Institute and Tribeca Films and a wide range of content from brand name suppliers, including National Geographic, Discovery, Scholastic, NFL, Shout Factory, Hallmark, Jim Henson and more. 
Additionally, given Cinedigm’s infrastructure, technology, content and distribution expertise, the Company has rapidly become a leader in the quickly evolving over-the-top digital network business. Cinedigm’s first channel, DOCURAMA, launched in May 2014, and is currently available on iOS, Roku, Xbox and Samsung, with additional platforms currently being rolled out. Cinedigm launched CONtv, a Comic Con branded channel, on March 3, 2015. The Company’s third OTT channel, DOVE CHANNEL, launched on September 15, 2015 and is a digital streaming subscription service targeted to families and kids seeking high quality and family friendly content approved by Dove Foundation.
